title: Zodiac Patheon
body:
I love astrology and I would really like to have some skinline that plays with the idea of the signs and live my gold saints fantasy XD.

Pantheon representing Aries, Aries is a sign that is ruled by Mars and it represent the action, strength, sometimes with a short-tempered midset, other characters that I think kinda fit the mold of Aries are Katarina, Aatrox and Tryndamere.

For Taurus I’m thinking of Alistar cuz it’s a bull duh, Sivir because she’s loves her coins or Taliyah because of her willpower and also how cool that ult would look...what do you guys think? Hope you guys/gals dig the concept! Ty.

https://imgur.com/a/LFhD8Dz

replies.body:
Aries for Rakan or Galio. 
Nami for Pisces
Qiyana is a Leo for sure. Her attitute is everything but Leo. 
Taliyah would be great with Virgo since it's an earth sign. 
Libra is for Kayle because she is the justice and justice has a balance. 
Saggitarus for Varus 
Scorpio for Skarner
Aquarius for Janna
Capricorn for Orn
Taurus for Alistar of course. 
Gemini for Leblanc or Shaco since they can make clones. 



Yasuo or Riven or Pyke for Cancer xD

Sorry for the last one but i'm a cancer too and i really hate my sign... Serious why our sign have the same name as the disease ? :(.

yeah hahaha that cancer joke never gets old, I'm a cancer too <3 
I'm gonna share my list, I'm choosing champions that kinda goes with 2-3 signs traits that I'm picking up  

my list:
Aries - Pantheon - Strength/Power/War
Taurus - Taliyah/Allistar/Sivir - Willpower/Money
Gemini - Leblanc - Deceive/Knowlegde
Cancer - Yuumi/Diana - Protection/Nourishing/Moon
Leo - Leona - Sun/Splendor/Leader
Virgo - Irelia - Maiden/Clean
Libra - Shen/Kayle - Balance/Justice
Scorpio - Miss Fortune - Power/Secrets/Revenge/Sex
Sagittarius - Hecarim (I'm still effy about that one because hecarim doesnt have the traits of a sagittarius) - FreeSpirit/Joyous
Capricorn - Ornn - Grumpy/Hardworker
Aquarius - Zoe/Illaoi - Believer/Young forever.
Pisces - Xayah & Rakan/Nami/Soraka - Humanitarian/Spirituality

Yeap as a saggitarian myself, I always see the Centaur as my sign. Hecarim is the only centaur in the game. Therefore, he is the only one who can represent my Zodiac sign.
I laughed at that "Varus Saggitarian" it was hilarious

Saggitarian's bad signs represent the savagery, self centered behavior and leadership among others
Hecarim EXACTLY matches these traits. He is a completetly EVIL Saggitarian in the form of a Centaur. He is 10/10 fit.

Also, Skarner will have a VGU one day next year probably either late 2020 or 2021 roughly. Wait for him to get his VGU first, then I would like to see your Scorpio concept because I am very connected with Scorpions somehow.

Hey there!
I main Nautilus at the 7 season,and he is my favorite and kinda sad what he did not get a skin....Anyway,i want to quest you about his zodiac,because i don't really understand what kind of zodiac he have (shame me for an Nautilus main...)

And when you'll tell me his zodiac,can you make a skin about him,please?i would be happy if you'll do it.

I like your choices and i understand why you made these choices. You know astrology better than i do xD. 

Oh you are a cancer too <3. You know this feeling :).

I can't say Varus for Saggitarius, as a saggitarian myself, this doesn't make any sense. Our sign is a Centaur!
Saggitarius is Hecarim, he is the only Horseman in the game and the main sign of Saggitarians is the Horseman
Your sign is also a bow. Hecarim don't have a bow, even tought he is a centaur.

Yes but between a Centaur and a bow, Centaur would make more sense. It's the main sign
What would a bow represent? we have {{champion:22}} {{champion:110}} and none of them would represent the Centaur sign
{{champion:120}} might not have a bow, but he is the Centaur, and the structure is > weapon so Hecarim would make much more sense.
Unless you make a Horseman Ashe/Varus skin, but that would be weird because they aren't suppose to be Centaurs.

Actually a horseman Varus wouldn't be that bad. 

Varus pants is weird. I don't know what he is wearing but he seems like his body is cut in 2 part. His torso + head and arms and his legs. 

We can replace his bottom part with a centaur one. 


You are right, the weapon is less important than the body but in game, it's matter. Hecarim can't be a Saggitarus if he don't have a ranged attack. 

It's would be easier to make Varus a centaur since he already have a bow and ranged attack while making Hecarim a ranged champ would be more complicated.

At this point, I'll take it
If Varus would ever have a Horseman skin, then I'll see it as the perfect sign of saggitarius

I think the Targonian Aspects already represent celestial bodies and such, and have a star-heavy theme, so I'm not sure how suited they would be for an astrological theme since it overlaps a lot of their standard themes pretty heavily.
indeed I havehit  that wall a lot with diana, leona and pantheon XD it overlaps a lot u,u
While I understand your reasoning for Pantheon, I think the most obvious choice for Aries should be Ornn.

I disagree, {{champion:516}} Ornn fits Capricorn much better than he does Aries. Really the only thing that makes Aries a better fit is that Ornn is literally a ram, but Capricorn is a goat so it's not that different.
thanks! Ornn is one of the canditates for Capricorn <3
hi! yeah Ornn was the first who came to my mind when I started doing the ideas for aries, but he didn't fit the signs traits.
